analysis.description:
ShiftCashIco.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0xa55fc2f935e5decd52685e28c9f1e94528f86c70.sol#411-439) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- require(bool)(escrow.send(this.balance)) (/unique_contracts/0xa55fc2f935e5decd52685e28c9f1e94528f86c70.sol#436-439)

Reentrancy in ShiftCashIco.importTokens (/unique_contracts/0xa55fc2f935e5decd52685e28c9f1e94528f86c70.sol#392-407):
	External calls:
	- preIcoBalance = preIcoToken.balanceOf(_account) (/unique_contracts/0xa55fc2f935e5decd52685e28c9f1e94528f86c70.sol#399-400)
	- shiftcashToken.emitTokens(_account,preIcoBalance) (/unique_contracts/0xa55fc2f935e5decd52685e28c9f1e94528f86c70.sol#401-404)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- importedFromPreIco (/unique_contracts/0xa55fc2f935e5decd52685e28c9f1e94528f86c70.sol#406)

Reentrancy in ShiftCashIco.sendTokensToBountyOwner (/unique_contracts/0xa55fc2f935e5decd52685e28c9f1e94528f86c70.sol#464-475):
	External calls:
	- shiftcashToken.emitTokens(bountyOwner,bountyTokens) (/unique_contracts/0xa55fc2f935e5decd52685e28c9f1e94528f86c70.sol#472-474)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- sentTokensToBountyOwner (/unique_contracts/0xa55fc2f935e5decd52685e28c9f1e94528f86c70.sol#474-475)

Reentrancy in ShiftCashIco.sendTokensToFounders (/unique_contracts/0xa55fc2f935e5decd52685e28c9f1e94528f86c70.sol#477-481):
	External calls:
	- shiftcashToken.emitTokens(founder1,totalRewardToFounder) (/unique_contracts/0xa55fc2f935e5decd52685e28c9f1e94528f86c70.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
